Running the License Report

The License Report provides license compliance information and may also be used by Borland Technical Support when responding to customer inquiries. This report can be run from the Server Administration dialog.

To run the License Report:

  1. Do one of the following:

    • On a computer that has the Server installed, select Start > Programs > StarTeam > StarTeam Server x.x > StarTeam Server.

    • From the client, select Start > Programs > StarTeam > StarTeam client_name > Server Administration (available with custom installations only).

    The Server Administration dialog appears.

  2. Select a server configuration from the left pane.  If you have not yet logged on, you will be asked to do so. If you are using the client, you can administer remote servers only. The Server Administration dialog appears.

  3. From the Server Administration dialog, click the License icon or select Actions > License usage. The system displays the following message:

    4. Please contact Borland Software Corporation with these files ‘X:\...\UsageInfo.txt’ and ‘X:\...\UsageInfo.sig’

  4. Click OK.

  5. Locate the report files in Windows NT or Explorer.

  6. If appropriate, send the files to Borland Technical Support.
